General.Name: Shiva Mills Limited
General.Description: Shiva Mills Limited manufactures and markets cotton yarns in India. It exports its products. The company was formerly known as STYL Textile Ventures Limited and changed its name to Shiva Mills Limited in August 2017. Shiva Mills Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
